title: Le'Veon Bell Drama, Packers Missing Defense, NFL Prediction and the Herd Hierarchy
itunes:title: Le'Veon Bell Drama, Packers Missing Defense, NFL Prediction and the Herd Hierarchy
description:
Colin discusses the situation between RB Le'Veon Bell and the Pittsburgh Steelers, why the Green Bay Packers should spend money on defense, teams he likes this coming NFL season, and the Herd Hierarchy. Guests include Nick Wright, Peter King, Greg Cosell, and TJ Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
